titleStmt.title: The impeachment against the bishops. Sent up by Serjeant Wylde, and delivered at the barr in the Lords house by order of the House. August the 4. 1641.
titleStmt.author: Wilde, John, 1590-1669.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.N. for Henry Twyford, and are to be sold at the three Daggers in Fleet-street,
